channel.title: [Project] Frostillium
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/1914/frosttillium.png[/img][/center] [center] Base : [IMG]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/8572/runeforge.png[/img] Goals Green || Orange || Red Finished|| Unfinished || Not started
Systems[center] • Player Saving • OnDemand • JagGrab • Player Loading • Walking • Packet Handling • Handle all packets • NPC Rendering • Flood Protection • Script System • Update Control • Item System • Region System • Player Updating • Sinis Nio Networking API
Skills[center] • Woodcutting • Mining • Fishing • Prayer • Ranged • Magic • Smithing • Cooking • Firemaking • Crafting • Fletching • Runecrafting • Thieving • Agility • Slayer • Herblore
Minigames[center] • Castle Wars • Duel Arena • Barrows [/center]
Player Vs Player[center] • Combat System • Player Vs Player • Clipped Following
Media none
Support us! [center][IMG]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/9752/isupportfrostillium.png[/img][/center] Will be using this until I find a gfx dudes.
[center] Alright, Frostillium is going to be a 317 like 2007, but more based towards player killing, therefor we will be working on a perfect combat system. If you were wondering Frostillium came to mind when I looked at the Frosted Flakes cereal box in my kitchen, Anyway, Most of the minigames will hopefully be added later on example : Dual arena and Castle wars because they are fun. So hopefully I will get lots of supporters it would be nice and if you support thanks this thread and use our support banner! enjoy the updates and keep in-touch for future updates! Thanks guys <3

item.title: [Project] Frostillium
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“MrCanada, post:4, topic:404598”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=501615.msg3670077#msg3670077 date=1310856617]
So far the thread looks decent, and organized, however, I would provide a little more information on this base that’s being used because I doubt all those are red unless the base is like Hyperion or something.
[/quote]

added the base, its even better then hyperion

Is the Frost part of the server name Irony because you’re from Canada?

Good luck mate. If you need some help I’ll help you, considering you’re starting from scratch.

Actually yes but, I saw frosted flakes in my kitchen ;)[/quote]

There great

Read full topic
